bug.question: I have spots, and I can fly! What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have round markings on my back.
🐞 People think I bring good luck!
🌱 I like to land on plants.

bug.question: I make honey, and I buzz around flowers! What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I collect nectar from pretty blossoms.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry things with my friends. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 We are very small and strong.
🧺 We carry food back to our home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and turn into something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I used to be a crawling creature.

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 You might hear me in a field.

bug.question: I glow in the dark on warm summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 You can see me at night.

bug.question: I sing very loudly in the summer. I spend most of my life underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I like to sit on trees.
🌱 My babies live in the dirt for many years.

bug.question: I am long and skinny, and I eat leaves, sometimes making holes in them. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be green or brown.
🐛 Some people think I look like a stick.

bug.question: I am a predator with big eyes and grab my prey with spiky legs. What am I?
I'm an insect that can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: ⛸️ My legs are spread out to distribute my weight.
🌊 You might find me on a pond or lake.

animal.question: I meow and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I am a good friend and companion.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I love to swim in water.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 I make delicious milk for you to drink.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?
I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I am a very strong cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I run very fast on the savanna.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am gray and very big.
💦 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from the highest branches.

animal.question: I waddle, lay eggs, and live in cold places. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I cannot fly, but I am a good swimmer.
